explains: adv. 不知不觉地；不知情地；不经意地

sentences.en: He was unwittingly caught up in the confrontation.
sentences.cn: 他无意中陷入了这场冲突。

sentences.en: It was clear that, wittingly or unwittingly, he had offended her.
sentences.cn: 很显然，不管是有意还是无意，他反正得罪了她。

sentences.en: Parents can unwittingly transmit their own fears to their children.
sentences.cn: 父母自己的恐惧有可能在无意中感染了孩子。
